overview: Our Town is a short Documentary film about a public art project that took place in Nashville, Tennessee. An artist collective seeks to make a portrait of Nashville using the citizens of the city as artists themselves. OFFICIAL SELECTION: - 2021 Knoxville Film Festival. Knoxville, TN. - 2021 Franklin International Film Festival. Franklin, TN. - 2021 Cat Fly Film Festival. Asheville, NC - 2021 WCTE-PBS Downtown Film Festival. Cookeville, TN
title: Our Town
